## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 15,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | Current stock + 15,000 units will cover the projected demand for the next 5 days, with a buffer for potential demand variability. Utilizing a single order quantity of 15,000 units avoids multiple orders and related processing costs. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Player's planned purchase is lower than the recommended order size, which can lead to potential stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2.8 days                                |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5.2 days                                |
| Comments                          | Ordering 15,000 units ensures sufficient stock to meet projected demand, potentially reducing stockouts while also benefiting from a single order quantity. |
